title: Possible Bug
body: When I opened the loot page with the new update it said my total Blue Essence was just over 30,000, but I only had just over 23,000. I wasn't sure if it was just a bug with the message or if the transfer bugged and I lost some of my Blue Essence.

replies.body: You'll need to complete the mission then head over to your hextech loot to grab the remaining BE.
Edit: Nevermind, the bonus is earned through a mission. Hope that helps
